problem.markdown:
1. WEDM generally uses, ( ) Fixed frequency, pulse time (τp ) and pulse off time (Toff) (x) Variable frequency, pulse time (τp ) and pulse off time (Toff) ( ) Constant Voltage and Current ( ) All of the above
2. The material removal rate depends on ( ) Pulse time (τp ) ( ) Current (Ip) ( ) pulse off time (Toff) (x) All of the above
3. Selection of process parameters are done on the basis of job ( ) Specification ( ) Roughness (x) Matrix ( ) Productivity
4. Wire EDM is generally used for ferrous materials with ( ) Direct polarity (Wire -ve and work +ve) (x) Reverse polarity (Wire +ve and work -ve) ( ) The machine automatically selects polarity ( ) None of the above
5. Does porosity in job material affect machining process? (x) Yes ( ) No ( ) At times ( ) None of Above
6. Accuracy of the job depends upon ( ) Pulse time (τp ) ( ) Current (Ip) ( ) Wire speed (x) Wire tension and feed rate

choicegroup.choice: Fixed frequency, pulse time (τp ) and pulse off time (Toff)
Variable frequency, pulse time (τp ) and pulse off time (Toff)
